description: The time this notice was created in ISO 8601 format.
name: time_created

description: URLs relevant to the event, if any.
name: urls

fields.description: Time of the event in ISO 8601 format.
fields.name: time

fields.description: False alarm rate of the event in Hz.
fields.name: far

fields.description: True for significant alerts.
fields.name: significant

fields.description: Instruments that participated in the observation as an array.
fields.name: instruments

fields.description: A skymap in a multi-order FITS format as a Base64-encoded string.
fields.name: skymap

fields.description: The type of search that uploaded the event.
fields.name: search

fields.description: The data analysis working group that uploaded the event.
fields.name: group

fields.description: The data analysis pipeline that uploaded the event.
fields.name: pipeline

fields.description: The duration of the burst in seconds. Only present if group=Burst.
fields.name: duration

fields.description: The central frequency of the burst. Only present if group=Burst.
fields.name: central_frequency

fields.description: The probabilities that the source has various properties, assuming that the source is astrophysical.
Probability that at least one of the compact objects was a neutron star
fields.name: HasNS

fields.description: Probability that the system ejected a non-zero amount of neutron star matter
fields.name: HasRemnant

fields.description: Probability that at least one of the compact objects has mass in the range 3-5 solar masses
fields.name: HasMassGap
properties

fields.description: The probabilities that the event is of terrestrial origin or originates from various astrophysical categories. Only present if group=CBC.
Probability that the source is a BNS
fields.name: BNS

fields.description: Probability that the source is a NSBH
fields.name: NSBH

fields.description: Probability that the source is a BBH
fields.name: BBH

fields.description: Probability that the source is Terrestrial (i.e, noise)
fields.name: Terrestrial
classification

fields.description: The GCN notice ID of the coincident external event.
fields.name: gcn_notice_id

fields.description: The VO identifier associated with the external VOEvent.
fields.name: ivorn

fields.description: The observatory reporting the coincident external event.
fields.name: observatory

fields.description: The search reporting the coincident external event.
fields.name: search

fields.description: The difference in time, in seconds, between the external coincident event and the gravitational-wave event.
fields.name: time_difference

fields.description: The joint time coincidence FAR in units of Hz, if available.
fields.name: time_coincidence_far

fields.description: The joint time and sky position coincidence FAR in units of Hz, if available.
fields.name: time_sky_position_coincidence_far

fields.description: A skymap in a multi-order FITS format produced by combining the GW skymap and the external coincidence skymap.
fields.name: combined_skymap
